ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Finance of DEREK KEY, C.M., O.P.E.I., Q.C., of Summerside, Prince Edward Island, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending February 28, 2018, effective March 1, 2015.
